DOC.brief_title: Calf Muscle Strength Standing Efficiency Children With Spastic Diplegia
DOC.criteria: Children age range 2 4 year . They classify level III GMFCSER , i.e . stand minimal support . Full mobile lower limbs joint . Children mild moderate spasticity ( i.e . grade 1 2 , accord Modified Ashworth Scale ) . Children severe spasticity ( i.e . grade 4 , accord Modified Ashworth Scale ) . Fixed deformity . Uncontrolled seizure .
